content: this original design requires only three crochet stitches - chain stitch single_crochet and the popcorn this blanket is made in separate pieces and then crocheted together however if you prefer to make our blankets as one piece included is a chart for that as well the pattern includes row-by-row written instructions for each individual piece charts for each individual piece the chart to complete the blanket in one piece so you can select the method you prefer it also includes a list of materials links to our youtube videos and yarn amounts needed for a finished blanket approximately 53 x 68 the pattern can be customized to your own color choices the blanket in the photo was made using plymouth encore yarn copyright © 2023 color & shape design llc all rights reserved
